origin:
ttl: 0

From http://www.tcpipguide.com/free/t_DNSZoneFileFormat-4.htm

>>> zone_in.txt
$ORIGIN pcguide.com.
@ IN SOA ns23.pair.com. root.pair.com. (
2001072300 ; Serial
3600 ; Refresh
300 ; Retry
604800 ; Expire
3600 ) ; Minimum

@ IN NS ns23.pair.com.
@ IN NS ns0.ns0.com.

localhost IN A 127.0.0.1
@ IN A 209.68.14.80
  IN MX 50 qs939.pair.com.

www IN CNAME @
ftp IN CNAME @
mail IN CNAME @
relay IN CNAME relay.pair.com.

<<< zone_out.txt
$ORIGIN pcguide.com.
@ SOA ns23.pair.com. root.pair.com. 2001072300 3600 300 604800 3600
@ 3600 IN NS ns23.pair.com.
	 3600 IN NS ns0.ns0.com.
	 3600 IN A 209.68.14.80
	 3600 IN MX 50 qs939.pair.com.
ftp 3600 IN CNAME @
localhost 3600 IN A 127.0.0.1
mail 3600 IN CNAME @
relay 3600 IN CNAME relay.pair.com.
www 3600 IN CNAME @

<<< message_0.hex
